articles.description: ‘Tick, tick, tick’: Greats back Green as the gun Australia has needed for years
articles.content:
Cricket greats Brett Lee and Mark Waugh have declared Cameron Green Australias permanent No. 6, despite the recent efforts of Mitch Marsh.
Green went for a golden duck after leaving his first ball a… [+3815 chars]
